meanings.definition: To fill with overwhelming surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick astounds the audience every time.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected plot twist in the movie astounds viewers.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog astounds everyone at the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to speak multiple languages astounds her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset astounds all who witness it.

meanings.sent1: The grand fireworks display astounds the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The talented singer's performance astounds the judges.
meanings.sent3: The cat astounds its owner by playing the piano.
meanings.sent4: The speed of the cheetah astounds even the fastest runners.
meanings.sent5: The size of the whale astounds marine biologists.
